description: Attempted Deep Dens penetration - team entered area marked as Proscribed Coordinates; no member returned; records lost with team
aftermath: Led to revision of Proscribed Coordinates (Appendix D); strengthened prohibitions on Deep Dens attempts
related_incidents: Related to other Deep Dens failures; contributed to current prohibitions

outcome: Traumatic encounter - Grigsu survived but was permanently affected
description: Grigsu's traumatic encounter with Yeller - nature of incident documented in Notebook 007; marked turning point in his research
aftermath: Grigsu continued research but with changed perspective; eventually died near Yeller Quarry
related_incidents: Central to understanding Grigsu's work and limitations

key_figures: The Boss (Hayley) / Truck / Gull / Black Yeller
outcome: The Boss beheaded by Black Yeller; expedition destroyed
description: Commercial creature-gathering expedition that attempted to capture/exploit Yeller; ended in massacre by Black Yeller
aftermath: Gull as sole survivor spreads account; demonstrates danger of commercial Dens exploitation
related_incidents: Largest documented single-expedition loss; changed attitudes toward Yeller

outcome: Total loss - Pollux Dann killed along with entire team
description: Major expedition failure with complete casualty count documented; Pollux Dann was noted field taxonomist
aftermath: 27 deaths in single expedition shocked Capital scholarly community
related_incidents: One of worst documented expedition outcomes

outcome: Mission failure - Wen Torval among casualties
description: Expedition failure that killed Wen Torval - demonstrated ongoing Dens dangers
Original establishment of Mirado City - precedes the siege by significant time; details fragmentary
aftermath: City became major W1 settlement; eventually site of extended siege
related_incidents: Background to Siege of Mirado narrative

description: Initial exploration from Capital to Mirado region - established route and contact
aftermath: Enabled later military and scholarly access to Mirado region
related_incidents: Precursor to all subsequent Mirado operations

description: Series of Capital missions to Mirado prior to and during siege - diplomatic and military purposes
aftermath: Established Capital interest in Mirado; preceded military campaign
